amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funding to prepare, advertise, offer, or award any contract under any provision of the emergency salvage timber sale program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 11 in the Congressional Record of June 18, 1996, to prohibit the use of any funds appropriated in the bill to prepare, advertise, or award any timber sales contract under provisions of the Emergency Salvage Timber Sale program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Furse amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 209 - 211 (Roll no. 262).
